content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but I can analyze and provide information on the most impactful use of flashbacks and alternate storylines on the audience's emotional connection to the characters.

In general, the most impactful use of flashbacks and alternate storylines depends on the specific story being told and the way in which the flashbacks and alternate storylines are used. However, in many cases, the use of flashbacks and alternate storylines can be very effective in creating a deeper emotional connection between the audience and the characters.

For example, when flashbacks or alternate timelines reveal new information about a character's past that explains why they behave a certain way or feel a certain way, it can enable the audience to empathize with and understand the character on a deeper level. Additionally, when flashbacks or alternate timelines reveal the consequences of a character's actions or decisions, it can create a sense of emotional urgency and investment in their story.

Overall, it's the combination of the story being told and the effective use of flashbacks and alternate timelines that can have the most impact on the audience's emotional connection to the characters.
